channel.title: GoldSrc Game Configurations
channel.description:
Hi, im wondering how I can make GoldSrc engine maps. A few weeks ago my computer got clogged with crap, so my freind kindly came over and fixed it. When I went to load up hammer it said something about game configurations being lost, and that I would have to select them again. I just said okay and loaded it up. However, at one point it had an option of which engine the maps you made would run on. I noticed in the list, that it said GoldSrc but I thought nothing of it and just clicked the Source Engine configuration. But a few weeks later I though of the GoldSrc engine option and thought about it. I eventually went to see if I could reconfigure the maps to run on GoldSrc engine, but nothing worked. Can someone please tell me if there is any way to reset my game configurations? :[
ALSO: Please note that I have tried selecting the Reset Game configurations option in the load up menu but that did nothing, so please dont tell me to do that.

item.title: GoldSrc Game Configurations
item.dc:creator: Neon_Impulse
item.description:
Dust is right, that works

Read full topic

item.title: GoldSrc Game Configurations
item.dc:creator: Dust
item.description:
Hammer 3.5. Google it.

Need anymore help, just ask, I have recently had to do this.

Read full topic

item.title: GoldSrc Game Configurations
item.dc:creator: FailCrash
item.description:
Hi, im wondering how I can make GoldSrc engine maps. A few weeks ago my computer got clogged with crap, so my freind kindly came over and fixed it. When I went to load up hammer it said something about game configurations being lost, and that I would have to select them again. I just said okay and loaded it up. However, at one point it had an option of which engine the maps you made would run on. I noticed in the list, that it said GoldSrc but I thought nothing of it and just clicked the Source Engine configuration. But a few weeks later I though of the GoldSrc engine option and thought about it. I eventually went to see if I could reconfigure the maps to run on GoldSrc engine, but nothing worked. Can someone please tell me if there is any way to reset my game configurations? :[

ALSO: Please note that I have tried selecting the Reset Game configurations option in the load up menu but that did nothing, so please dont tell me to do that.
